sentences.en: Be not content with the commonplace in character.
sentences.cn: 不要满足于普通的共性.

sentences.en: Car thefts are commonplace in this part of town.
sentences.cn: 镇上的这个地段盗车案屡见不鲜。

sentences.en: He is a commonplace person.
sentences.cn: 他是个凡夫俗子.

sentences.en: He was an unambitious man destined for a commonplace job.
sentences.cn: 他是一个没有野心的人，注定要找一个平凡的工作。

sentences.en: Ill-treatment of animals remains commonplace.
sentences.cn: 虐待动物的现象依然很普遍。

sentences.en: Inter-racial marriages have become commonplace.
sentences.cn: 不同种族间的通婚已经变得很常见。

sentences.en: It is a commonplace fact that holidays are a major test of any relationship.
sentences.cn: 度假对任何恋爱关系都是重大考验，这是常识。

sentences.en: It is a commonplace to say that Northern Ireland is a backwater in the modern Europe.
sentences.cn: 说北爱尔兰是现代欧洲死气沉沉的落后地区已是陈词滥调了。

sentences.en: It's become a commonplace to see people collapsing from hunger in the streets.
sentences.cn: 现在在街上时不时会看见有人饿晕。

sentences.en: It's commonplace to see people collapsing from hunger in the streets.
sentences.cn: 在街上看见有人饿晕是很平常的事。

sentences.en: Jet travel is now a commonplace.
sentences.cn: 乘喷气式飞机旅行现在是寻常的事.

sentences.en: Making her way up the commonplace hall, she knocked at Carrie's door.
sentences.cn: 她一路穿过简陋的过道, 在嘉莉家的房门上敲了敲.

sentences.en: Single-parent homes are commonplace.
sentences.cn: 单亲家庭很普遍。

sentences.en: Soon it will be commonplace for men to travel to the moon.
sentences.cn: 人们去月球旅行很快就会成为常事.

sentences.en: That night the pretty little flat seemed a commonplace thing.
sentences.cn: 那天晚上,那套漂亮的小公寓显得十分乏味.

sentences.en: The fashionable remarks of today often become the commonplace expressions of tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 今天的时髦话往往变成明天的陈词滥调.

sentences.en: The graceful preface was laced by a commonplace maid near the furnace in the palace without any trace of embrace.
sentences.cn: 这份优雅的前言是由一个平凡的侍女在宫殿里的火炉边，不留住拥抱过的痕迹而系上带子的。

sentences.en: Wacky ideas are commonplace among space scientists.
sentences.cn: 太空科学家想法古怪是不足为奇的。

sentences.en: What he has said is a mere commonplace view.
sentences.cn: 他所说的不过是尘俗之见而已.

sentences.en: Women’s groups have become a commonplace.
sentences.cn: 妇女团体已经成了常见事物。

trans.tran_en: happening or existing in many places, and therefore not special or unusual
something that has been said so often that it is no longer interesting or original
